title: Michaela Betrayed
description: This is the story of a gifted young musician forced to choose between aspirations of a career in music, and her loyalty and feelings towards her first lover, Thomas.As the winner of a prestigious scholarship in music, Michaela moves overseas, leaving Thomas behind in a physical sense only.Unexpected events both in her Australian homeland and in London make for life-changing developments.This is an engaging tale of love and betrayal.
author: Margaret Lynette Sharp
